name: Project Alchemist Alpha 0.3.5
description:
Alpha 0.3.5 of the game Project Alchemist

This version is basically a port of the game from Godot 2.1 to Godot 3.1, so the gameplay may differ a bit from the last alpha.

Controls:

Move = Arrow keys / Dpad / Dpad

Jump = Z / X / A

Inventory= Enter/Options/Menu

Options menu = Backspace / Touchpad / Select

Move cursor = Mouse / Right analog / Right analog

Alchemy center energy / Aim  ( Hold )= Mouse button center / L1 / LB

Climb = Space / R1 / RB

Left attack = Left click / L2 / LT

Right attack = Right click / R2 / RT

Use Objects/Alchemy:

A / Circle / B

S / Triangle / Y
